amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete section 103 which prohibits the use of Federal funds for abortion services for women in Federal prisons.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 103 that prohibits any funds to be used to pay for an abortion except where the life of the mother is endangered, or in the case of rape.

action.text: On agreeing to the DeGette amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 271 (Roll No. 387).
